category.name: Validation Manager
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_VALIDATION_TIMESTAMP_NREFS
preference.preference_description: Timestamp on a validation result and dataset is compared to decide whether the result is up-to-date. The following list is an extension to this logic. The list gives the Namedref list against each dataset type. For the following dataset types, instead of the dataset timestamp, the named reference timestamp is used to compare the dates. Valid Values: TRUE - Enables the named reference timestamp. FALSE - Disables the named reference timestamp.
